name: Illuminaria
storyline: Centuries ago, the planet of Illuminaria was full of life. Then, darkness appeared and took it all away. The Illumi, the world’s inhabitants, tried to stop the darkness but couldn’t do it on time. So as a last resort, they created an automated system to save the world. It’s now up to the player to control this high-tech system and restore light to save Illuminaria.
summary: Bring back light into a world overtaken by darkness. Control a swarm of intelligent robots while mining resources, building bases, and crafting weapons to defend them. Manage multiple bases simultaneously while also researching new technologies. Forge powerful golems to capture new locations and liberate the world of Illuminaria in this strategic resource management game.
